description: Coated in crunchy coconut and quinoa, this crumbed chicken is delicious served with a side of tangy tomato chutney.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quinoa & CoconutCrumbed Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Macro Organic chicken breast fillets, cut into 3cmthick strips
4 tbs Macro Organic tomato chutney (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fanforced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Place flour on a plate, whisk egg in a shallow bowl, and combine quinoa and coconut on a separate plate. Working with one piece of chicken at a time, coat chicken in flour, then dip in egg and finish by coating in quinoa mixture. Place on tray. Repeat with remaining chicken, flour, egg and quinoa mixture.

Spray chicken with oil. Bake for 20 minutes, turning and spraying chicken with oil halfway through cooking, or until chicken is light golden and cooked through. Sprinkled chicken with parsley and serve with chutney.
